name: Overlooker
description:
Play as Arianna, a woman lost in a giant building, and escape the terror in this Gameboy Color inspired Survival Horror nightmare! Overlooker is a top down 2D game combining elements from action and horror genres. Use a melee weapon or firearms to fight monsters, read documents and examine the area around you to learn about the game's cryptic backstory, and find keys and items that enable you to progress deeper into the abyss.

The sequel Overlooker 2 is out now!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Overlooker is my first game and was completed in under 22 days. My main goal has been to keep the game as minimal as possible and learn as much as I can about game development. I am looking for as much constructive criticism and as many comments as possible about the game so that I can improve for my next game, so feel free to e-mail me at connorortlinning@gmail.com!
